meanings.definition: Contemplated or considered as a possibility.
meanings.sent1: The children had an envisaged plan for their treehouse.
meanings.sent2: The envisaged outcome of the project was exciting.
meanings.sent3: She giggled at the envisaged idea of flying pigs.
meanings.sent4: His envisaged world was filled with colorful unicorns.
meanings.sent5: The envisaged dream felt so real.

meanings.definition: To imagine or visualize as a future possibility.
meanings.sent1: He envisaged a successful career in his mind.
meanings.sent2: She envisaged a beautiful garden in her backyard.
meanings.sent3: The cat envisaged catching the laser pointer dot.
meanings.sent4: The artist envisaged the canvas as a blank slate.
meanings.sent5: They envisaged a world without limits.
